thread.title: Fort Lee artist wins first prize in mixed media at Edgewater arts festival - Art
thread.title_full: Fort Lee artist wins first prize in mixed media at Edgewater arts festival - Art - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Fort Lee artist wins first prize in mixed media at Edgewater arts festival - Art
text:
ART: Ft. Lee artisttops in competition 
Fort Lee resident Jane Sklar recently won first prize in the "mixed media" category and the "best in show" award at the 24th Edgewater Arts and Music Festival. Sklar competed against 70 other local artists in divisions like fiber arts and photography. Judges noted her creative and innovative use of digital image manipulation. Information: maxjer sey.com/janesklar.html or edgewaterartsnj.org.
â€” Rebecca Rosenthal
